distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for poppler fixes the following issues:

  - CVE-2022-27337: Fixed a logic error in the Hints::Hints function which can cause denial of service (bsc#1199272).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: A logic error in the Hints::Hints function of Poppler v22.03.0 allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via a crafted PDF file.
notes.title: CVE description
